headline.print_headline: U.N. Criticizes  Congo Officials Over Unrest
headline.main: U.N. Criticizes Congo for Response to Deadly Unrest

snippet: The high commissioner for human rights blamed the government for using excessive force during political demonstrations and riots that may have killed over 50 people....
lead_paragraph: The high commissioner for human rights blamed the government for using excessive force during political demonstrations and riots that may have killed over 50 people.
